tool_description: “Find By UDPRN” API gets address for the specified UDPRN. UDPRN stands for ‘Unique Delivery Point Reference Number.

api_list.name: Find By UDPRN
api_list.description: “Find By UDPRN” API gets address for the specified UDPRN. UDPRN stands for ‘Unique Delivery Point Reference Number.

required_parameters.name: udprn
required_parameters.description: Unique numeric code for any premise on the Postcode Address File.
